title: Middlekauff - 3 and Out - Wentz > Goff as a talent; Packers HC candidates; CFB Playoff breakdown; Foxboro home-field underrated; Richard Sherman's Russell Wilson hate
itunes:title: Middlekauff - 3 and Out - Wentz > Goff as a talent; Packers HC candidates; CFB Playoff breakdown; Foxboro home-field underrated; Richard Sherman's Russell Wilson hate
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  3 and Out with John Middlekauff is part of the Colin Cowherd Podcast Network. 3 and Out is an unfiltered podcast covering the biggest stories in the NFL and college football. John brings his unique perspective as a former NFL scout, NFL analyst and radio host. In this episode, John discusses Philly's MNF win over the Redskins, why they're in good shape long-term, why Carson Wentz is greater talent than Goff, why comparing Reuben Foster to Greg Hardy is reckless, and potential HC candidates for the Packers. John also breaks down the CFB Playoff, explains why Foxboro home-field advantage is underrated, looks at Richard Sherman's relentless Russell Wilson hate, and answers listener questions from the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
